templates.message: Crashes should be reported on the official bug tracker, you can open a pre-filled bug report using Blender's menu Help > Report A bug. I also highly suggest you to visit [Troubleshooting > Crashes ‚Äî Blender Manual](https://docs.blender.org/manual/en/latest/troubleshooting/crash.html)

templates.title: Thanks Comment
templates.message: Hello and welcome. This site is not a regular forum, while commenting "thanks" is always nice, the best way to reward a good answer is to [upvote it](https://blender.stackexchange.com/help/why-vote), and if it completely solved your issue, [mark it as accepted](https://blender.stackexchange.com/help/accepted-answer) using the ‚úîÔ∏èbutton.

templates.title: Operators VS Data API
templates.message: Blender‚Äôs operators are tools for users to access, they can be accessed with Python but they still have limitations that make them cumbersome to use programmatically. Instead, it is recommended to manipulate the data API directly. See [Using Operators - Blender Python API](https://docs.blender.org/api/current/info_gotchas_operators.html) and [API Reference Usage - Blender Python API](https://docs.blender.org/api/current/info_api_reference.html)
